---
title: "anon_data_RESQ"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tibble)
library(skimr)
library(magrittr)
library(purrr)
library(ggtext)
library(grid)
library(ggrepel)
library(directlabels)
library(reshape2)

```

```{r loadingData, echo=FALSE}

resq_anon <- read_csv("anon_data_Hendrik.csv")
#need to sort out hospital with only 1 year entry as they dont have any "progress"?

#cohorts need to be changed to their destination DTNMean instead, as this will show us
#where they started, showing us their "story".

resq_clean <- na.omit(resq_anon)

resq_df<-resq_clean %>%
  #filtering for years after 2015 only, as Mirek told us RES-Q was added in 2016. 
  #Dataset has a lot of misstypes, or errors? 1900, 2013, 2014 etc.
  filter(year > 2015) %>%
  group_by(hospital) %>%
  summarise(
    DTNMean=mean(DTN),
    firstYear=min(year)
    ) %>% ungroup() %>%
  group_by(firstYear) %>%
  mutate(
     DTNMeanCohort = cut(DTNMean, breaks = c(0, 30, 45, 60, 120, Inf), labels = c("<30", "30-45", "45-60", "60-120", ">120"))) %>% ungroup()

# %>% group_by(DTNMeanCohort) %>% summarise(CohortCount=n())


joined_df <- merge(resq_df, resq_clean, by="hospital")
  
ggplot(joined_df[joined_df$DTNMean < 200 & joined_df$year>=2016,], aes(x = year, y = DTNMean)) + 
  geom_line(aes(color = factor(hospital)), show.legend = FALSE) + 
  facet_wrap(~ DTNMeanCohort) + 
  theme_bw() + 
  scale_color_grey(start = 0.5, end=0.5)

rsqh <- joined_df %>%
  filter(hospital == "Hospital #101")

ggplot(rsqh[rsqh$DTNMedian<250 & rsqh$DTNMean < 200 & rsqh$year>=2016,], aes(x = year, y = DTNMean)) + 
  geom_line(aes(color = factor(hospital)), show.legend = FALSE) + 
  theme_bw() + 
  scale_color_grey(start = 0.5, end=0.5)

```
